mapper.select: SELECT t.llr_code llrCode, t.title title, t.case_name caseName, b.Employee_No employeeNo, b.USR_NAME userName, o.chinese_name orgName, b.USR_TEL tel, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') createDate, DATE_FORMAT( t.occurrence_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) occurDate, ddd.chinese_name sourceName, t.project_id, p.chinese_name projectName, t.parts_code partCode, t.parts_name partName, s.chinese_name pointName, t.case_description caseDescription, m.cause_analysis causeAnalysis, m.tmp_measures tmpMeasures, m.long_term_measure longTermMeasure, m.directive directive, CASE WHEN v.is_verify = 0 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END isVerify, v.charge, u.USR_NAME directorName, ooo.chinese_name deptName, v.verify_mode, dd.chinese_name verifyModeName, v.type, d.chinese_name typeName, v.quota, v.target_effect targetEffect, DATE_FORMAT(v.plan_time, '%Y-%m-%d') planDate, DATE_FORMAT(v.actual_time, '%Y-%m-%d') actualDate, oo.knowledge_id, kk.chinese_name docType, oo.doc_name docName, oo.doc_code docCode, oo.output_mode, dddd.chinese_name outputModeName, oo.content, oo.charge, uu.USR_NAME vDirectorName, DATE_FORMAT( oo.plan_completion_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) planCompletionTime, DATE_FORMAT( oo.actual_completion_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) actualCompletionTime FROM tt_basics_llr t LEFT JOIN tm_bas_users b ON t.create_by = b.ID LEFT JOIN tm_org o ON o.org_id = t.org_id LEFT JOIN tt_project p ON p.project_id = t.project_id LEFT JOIN tt_stage s ON s.stage_id = t.point_id LEFT JOIN tt_analysis_summary_me m ON m.llr_id = t.llr_id LEFT JOIN tm_system_dictionary ddd ON ddd.dic_no = t.source_id AND ddd.dic_type = 'me_source_mode' LEFT JOIN tt_me_verify v ON v.llr_id = t.llr_id JOIN tm_system_dictionary d ON d.dic_no = v.type AND d.dic_type = 'me_Verify_type' JOIN tm_system_dictionary dd ON dd.dic_no = v.verify_mode AND dd.dic_type = 'me_erification_mode' JOIN tm_bas_users u ON u.id = v.charge JOIN tm_org ooo ON ooo.org_id = v.dept_id LEFT JOIN tt_knowledge_output oo ON oo.llr_id = t.llr_id JOIN tt_knowledge kk ON kk.id = oo.knowledge_id JOIN tm_system_dictionary dddd ON dddd.dic_no = oo.output_mode AND dddd.dic_type = 'output_mode' JOIN tm_bas_users uu ON uu.id = oo.charge WHERE t.llr_code = 'LLR-MEI-14653'
